critical_incident:
# 🚨 **CRITICAL INCIDENT - P0**

## ⚠️ **IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED**

### 🔥 **Crisis Summary**
- **Alert Time**: [Timestamp]
- **Reporter**: [Name & Contact]
- **Department**: [Affected Department]
- **Patient Safety Risk**: [YES | NO]
- **Regulatory Impact**: [YES | NO]

### 📞 **EMERGENCY CONTACTS NOTIFIED**
- [ ] **Lab Manager**: [Name] - [Phone] ⏰ [Time Called]
- [ ] **Medical Director**: [Name] - [Phone] ⏰ [Time Called]  
- [ ] **Risk Management**: [Name] - [Phone] ⏰ [Time Called]
- [ ] **IT Director**: [Name] - [Phone] ⏰ [Time Called]
- [ ] **Administrator On-Call**: [Name] - [Phone] ⏰ [Time Called]

### 🚑 **FIRST 15 MINUTES RESPONSE**
⏰ **Response Actions**:
1. [ ] ⏰ [Time] - [Action taken]
2. [ ] ⏰ [Time] - [Action taken]  
3. [ ] ⏰ [Time] - [Action taken]

**Current Status**: [Brief status update]
**ETA to Resolution**: [Time estimate]

### 📊 **IMPACT ASSESSMENT**
- **Patients Affected**: [Number]
- **Revenue at Risk**: $[Amount]
- **Downtime Duration**: [Hours/Minutes]
- **Staff Involved**: [Number]
- **Regulatory Risk**: [High/Medium/Low]

### 🎯 **RESOLUTION STRATEGY**

#### Phase 1: Immediate (0-15 min)
- [ ] [Critical action 1]
- [ ] [Critical action 2]
- [ ] [Critical action 3]

#### Phase 2: Short-term (15-60 min)
- [ ] [Urgent action 1]  
- [ ] [Urgent action 2]
- [ ] [Urgent action 3]

#### Phase 3: Long-term (1+ hours)
- [ ] [Systematic action 1]
- [ ] [Systematic action 2]
- [ ] [Systematic action 3]

### 🚨 **ESCALATION TRIGGERS**
- [ ] **30 minutes**: Notify CEO if unresolved
- [ ] **1 hour**: Activate crisis team
- [ ] **2 hours**: Consider external resources
- [ ] **Patient harm**: Immediate regulatory notification

### 📝 **LIVE UPDATES LOG**
⏰ [Time] - [Update/Action/Status]
⏰ [Time] - [Update/Action/Status]
⏰ [Time] - [Update/Action/Status]

### 📋 **POST-RESOLUTION CHECKLIST**
- [ ] All systems verified operational
- [ ] Staff debriefing completed
- [ ] Regulatory notifications sent (if required)
- [ ] Root cause analysis initiated
- [ ] Documentation completed
- [ ] Lessons learned captured
